abstract: AT&T has begun lobbying the the Federal Communications Commission to mount a review of a proposed deal between its competitors Sprint Nextel and Clearwire to create the first of a new generation of nationwide wireless data networks.
lead_paragraph: AT&T has begun lobbying the the Federal Communications Commission to mount a review of a proposed deal between its competitors Sprint Nextel and Clearwire to create the first of a new generation of nationwide wireless data networks.

headline.main: AT&T Pushes for Review of Competitors’ WiMax Venture
